abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.effect: Damaging Moves that are the same type as the user add an additonal STAB to their damage rolls.

abilities.name: Aerilate
abilities.effect: The user's Normal Moves are treated as Flying type, and gain 2 additional STAB damage.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.effect: When the user is reduced to 0 HP or less, they create a 5-meter Burst. Everything in the Burst loses 1/4th of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Air Lock
abilities.effect: The weather is set to normal as long as the user wants it to remain that way.

abilities.name: Analytic
abilities.effect: For the next 5 rounds, if the user's turn comes immediately after any of its target's, the user deals 1 additional STAB damage on all damaging Moves, ignoring Type.

abilities.name: Anger Point
abilities.effect: When the user receives a critical hit, their Attack is raised by 6 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.effect: During an encounter, the user may target a Pokemon. Roll 1d20; on a 16 or better, the target reveals up to 5 Moves that are Super-Effective against the user and all of them must roll +2 during Accuracy Check to hit. On an 11 - 15, the target only reveals 3 Moves, and below 11 the target reveals only 1 Move.

abilities.name: Arena Trap
abilities.effect: A large wall of sand, 10 meters high, surrounds the encounter. The diameter of the Arena Trap must be at least 10 metres, but cannot be greater than 40 meters. There must be sufficient ground around to manipulate. The walls are constantly shifting, making it impossible to climb, and if a section is destroyed it immediately restores itself. The walls disappear if the user falls unconscious, dies, or is returned to a pokeball.

abilities.name: Aroma Veil
abilities.effect: The Moves Attract, Disable, Encore, Heal Block, Taunt, and Torment have no effect on the user and their adjacent allies.

abilities.name: Aura Break
abilities.effect: If the abilites Dark Aura or FAiry Aura are activated, Dark and Fairy Moves deal 2 less STAB damage instead of additional, while the Auras remain activated.

abilities.name: Bad Dreams
abilities.effect: Anything sleeping within 30 meters of the user loses 1/8th of their maximum HP at the beginning of each round.

abilities.name: Battery
abilities.effect: Raise all adjacent ally's Special Attack by 1 Combat Stage.

abilities.name: Battle Armour
abilities.effect: Critical Hits

abilities.name: Beast Boost
abilities.effect: Whenever the user knocks out a pokemon, it raises its highest non-HP stat by 1 Combat Stage.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.effect: When the user's HP is lowered below 50% of its maximum HP, the user's Special Attack is raised by 2 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.effect: The user cannot have its Defense stat lowered - directly or via Combat Stage reduction.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.effect: Fire

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.effect: The following moves have no effect on the Pokemon: Acid Spray, Aura Sphere, Barrage, Beak Blast, Bullet Seed, Egg Bomb, Electro Ball, Energy Ball, Focus Blast, Gyro Ball, Ice Ball, Magnet Bomb, Mist Ball, Mud Bomb, Octazooka, Pollen Puff, Rock Wrecker, Searing Shot, Seed Bomb, Shadow Ball, Sludge Bomb, Weather Ball, and Zap Cannon.

abilities.name: Cheek Pouch
abilities.effect: When the pokemon eats a Berry, they recover 15 HP in addition to the Berry's effects.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.effect: While in Sunny Weather, the Speed stat of the Pokemon is doubled.

abilities.name: Clear
abilities.effect: The pokemon's Combat Stages may not be lowered by the effect of Abilities or Moves. Status effects may still alter their Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.effect: Return the weather of the field to Neutral if the user is a higher level than the pokemon who caused the weather effect.

abilities.name: Colour Change
abilities.effect: Whenever the user is hit by a damage-dealing Move, the user will change type to that of the Move it was hit by.

abilities.name: Comatose
abilities.effect: The user is always Asleep, and cannot be given any other status conditions. The user may act as if it was not asleep.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.effect: Whenever the user has a Combat Stage lowered by an external force, its Special Attack is raised by 2 Combat Stages for each stage the other was lowered.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.effect: The user's Accuracy Checks take a -3 bonus.

abilities.name: Contrary
abilities.effect: Effects that lower or raise the the user's Combat Stages have the opposite effect.

abilities.name: Corrosion
abilities.effect: The user may Poison or Badly Poison any Steel or Poison type Targets.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.effect: When the user is hit by a Melee Move, that Move becomes Disabled after damage is dealt.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.effect: When an opposite gendered foe attacks the user, they become Infatuated after damage is dealt.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.effect: A pokemon may not use the Moves Explosion or Self-Destruct, nor activate the Ability Aftermath, within 20 meters of the user.

abilities.name: Dancer
abilities.effect: When the user is within 10 meters of any target that uses a Dance Move, the user may immediately after use the same Move, choosing new targets as needed.

abilities.name: Dark Art
abilities.effect: Dark

abilities.name: Dark Aura
abilities.effect: For the remainder of the encounter, Dark type Moves that deal Damage deal an additional 2 STAB damage.

abilities.name: Dazzling
abilities.effect: Pokemon within 20 meters of the user cannot use Interrupt Moves.

abilities.name: Defeatist
abilities.effect: When the user's HP is lowered below 50% of its maximum HP, the user's Attack and Special Attack are set to -3 Combat Stages, and cannot be raised until it is restored to above 50% of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.effect: Whenever the user has a Combat Stage lowered by an external force, its Attack is raised by 2 Combat Stages for each stage the other was lowered.

abilities.name: Delta Stream
abilities.effect: As a Free Action, eliminate all other Weather effects. As long as the user is present, any other Weather Moves or Abilities fail, and whenever a Pokemon takes Super-Effective damage because of its Flying type, it doesn't.

abilities.name: Desolate Land
abilities.effect: The user may, as a Free Action, use the Move Sunny Day.

abilities.name: Disguise
abilities.effect: The first time a user is dealt damage by a Move each encounter, the user instead ignores any effects of the Move.

abilities.name: Download
abilities.effect: Whenever the user targets a Pokemon with a damage dealing Move, the target must reveal which of its Defenses are lower. The user is treated as if the relevant attacking stat is raised by 1 Combat Stage.

abilities.name: Drizzle
abilities.effect: The user may, as a Free Action, use the Move Rain Dance.

abilities.name: Drought
abilities.effect: The user may, as a Free Action, use the Move Sunny Day.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.effect: The user loses 1/8th of its maximum HP at the beginning of each round while in Sunny Weather, and heals the same amount in Rainy Weather. Fire type Moves deal damage as if the attacker were 1 Combat Stage higher in the relevant stat, and Water type Moves heal the user for the amount of damage they would cause if the user was Resistant to them.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.effect: When making Sleep Checks, the counter starts at 11.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.effect: When the user is hit by a melee Move, roll 1d20. On a result of 15-16, the attacker is poisoned; on 17-18, the attacker is paralyzed; on a 19-20, the attacker falls asleep.

abilities.name: Electric Surge
abilities.effect: The user may, as a Free Action, use the Move Electric Terrain.

abilities.name: Emergency Exit
abilities.effect: When the user is damaged below 50% of their maximum HP, the user immediately begins to flee - gaining +20 to all Speed Skills. If a trainer does not return the user to its Pokeball within 1 round, the user's Loyalty will be lowered by 1.

abilities.name: Fae Force
abilities.effect: Fairy

abilities.name: Fairy Aura
abilities.effect: For the remainder of the encounter, Fairy type Moves that deal damage gain an additonal 2 STAB damage.

abilities.name: Filter
abilities.effect: The user takes 1.5x damage instead of 2x damage, and 3x instead of 4x, whenever they are hit by a Super-Effective Move.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.effect: When a foe hits the user with a Melee move, they become Burned after damage is dealt.

abilities.name: Flare Boost
abilities.effect: When Burned, the user's Special Attack is raised by 2 Combat Stages. If the user is cured of its Burn, its Special Attack is lowered by 2 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.effect: The user does not take damage from Fire moves and may not be Frozen. If hit by a Fire move, the user adds +1/2 STAB to the next Fire Type move they use in the current encounter.

abilities.name: Flower Gift
abilities.effect: In Sunny Weather, Flower Gift creates a 4-meter burst. The user and all of their allies in Sunny Weather have their Attack and Special Defense raised by 2 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Flower Veil
abilities.effect: Confusion, Infatuation, and having their stats lowered. This applies to the user and its Grass type allies.

abilities.name: Fluffy
abilities.effect: The user takes 1/2 damage from all Moves that deal physical damage. However, if the Move is Fire type, they take x2 damage. This is applied after weakness and resistance.

abilities.name: Focus
abilities.effect: Fighting

abilities.name: Forecast
abilities.effect: The user's type changes depending on the Weather: Fire for Sunny, Ice for Hail, Water for Rainy. It returns to Normal if it is any other conditon. If there are multiple Weather effects on the field, choose one type for the user to be amongst the corresponding options.

abilities.name: Forewarn
abilities.effect: The targeted foe reveals the Move with the highest damage dice roll that it knows, revealing all in case of a tie. Revealed Moves take a +2 to their Accuracy Check.

abilities.name: Freezing Point
abilities.effect: Ice

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.effect: For the remainder of the encounter, any adjacent allied pokemon who would be hit by any Moves that have more than one damage dice, including STAB or extra effects, the enmy does not include any STAB in their damage rolls.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.effect: The adjacent target reveals what item they are holding, if any.

abilities.name: Full Metal Body
abilities.effect: The user's Combat Stages may not be lowered by the fefect of Abilities or Moves. Status conditons may still alter them.

abilities.name: Fur Coat
abilities.effect: The user takes 1/2 damage from Moves that deal physical damage, after applying weakness and resistance.

abilities.name: Gale Wing
abilities.effect: The user may use a Flying type Move as an Interrupt.

abilities.name: Galvanize
abilities.effect: The user's Normal type moves are treated as Electric type Moves, and deal an additional 2 STAB damage.

abilities.name: Gather
abilities.effect: The user summons 1-2 Unown of a random nature, that are intially not hostile.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.effect: When given a consumable item, the Pokemon immediately eats it. Any effects of the item are doubled.

abilities.name: Gooey
abilities.effect: When the user is hit by a melee Move, the attacker's Speed is lowered by 1 Combat Stage.

abilities.name: Grass Pelt
abilities.effect: While on terrain covered in grass, the user's Defense is raised by 2 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Grassy Surge
abilities.effect: The user may, as a Free Action, use the Move Grassy Terrain.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.effect: When Burned, Frozen, Poisoned, Paralyzed, or put to Sleep, the user's Attack is raised by 2 Combat Stages. When the user loses the status, their attack is lowered the same amount.

abilities.name: Harvest
abilities.effect: Whenever the user eats a Berry, flip a coin. On heads, the user produces another Berry of the same variety as a held item available for use on the next turn; on tails, nothing happens. When in Sunny Weather, Harvest always activates successfully.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.effect: Ghost

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.effect: One adjacent target suffering from at least one status condition is instantly cured of all status conditions.

abilities.name: Heatproof
abilities.effect: The user halves the damage they would take from Fire type Moves after applying weakness and resistance.

abilities.name: Heavy Metal
abilities.effect: When referring to Weight Classes, treat the user as if it is 2 higher. The user cannot be pushed.

abilities.name: Honey Gather
abilities.effect: The user finds Honey if they are not holding an item. If this is activated in an encounter against a wild pokemon, the user cannot miss its next three Moves.

abilities.name: Huge Power
abilities.effect: The user's base attack stat is doubled. This may double any bonuses from Nature or Vitamins, but not from Features.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.effect: The user's Attack is raised by 1 Combat Stage. The user must roll +2 during Accuracy Checks to hit with physical Moves.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.effect: While in Rainy Weather, the user is healed of Burn, Freezing, Paralysis, Poison, or Sleep effects.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.effect: The user's Attack is raised by 1 Combat Stage, but the user's Accuracy Check requirements for Physical Moves are raised by 2.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.effect: While in Hail, the user gains 1/16th of their maximum HP at the beginning of their turn.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.effect: Moves that target the user must roll +2 to hit during Accuracy Check.

abilities.name: Illusion
abilities.effect: Whenevre the user is sent out of its Pokeball, you may choose another Pokemon that you have with you. The user now looks exactly like that Pokemon until it takes damage as a result of a Move. This change is aesthetic and can be dismissed at any time.

abilities.name: Immunity
abilities.effect: The Poisoned Status Condition.

abilities.name: Imposter
abilities.effect: When the user is sent out, it may use the Move Transform as a Free Action. If the target of Transform has any modified Combat Stages, apply these to the user. One of the target's abilities is randomly assigned to the user until it uses Transform again.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.effect: The user ignores Coats, Hazards, and Walls.

abilities.name: Innards Out
abilities.effect: When the user is knocked out by a Melee Move, the user deals damage to the attacker equal to the amount of HP the user had before getting knocked out. Do not apply weakness or resistance when dealing this damage.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.effect: Flinching

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.effect: Sleep

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.effect: Lower one target's Attack 1 Combat Stage.

abilities.name: Iron Barbs
abilities.effect: When the user is hit by a Melee Move, the attacker loses 1/8th of their maximum HP. Do not apply weakness or resistance.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.effect: The user deals an additional 2 STAB damage when using Punch Moves, as well as Hammer-Arm, Meteor Mash, and Sky Uppercut.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.effect: When the user is hit by a Dark type Move, the user may raise its Attack by 1 Combat Stage.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.effect: The user cannot have its Accuracy Check negatively effected by anything other than the target's Evasion.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.effect: The user may drop helf items at will as a free action, even if they have status afflictions. The user may also hold an item and ignore any effects the item has.

abilities.name: Landslide
abilities.effect: Ground

abilities.name: Last Chance
abilities.effect: Normal

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.effect: While in Sunny Weather, the user is healed of Burn, Freezing, Paralysis, Poison, or Sleep effects.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.effect: Ground

abilities.name: Light Metal
abilities.effect: When referring to Weight Classes, treat the user as if it is 2 lower. The user's Speed and Jump skills are increased by 3 and 1 respectively.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.effect: The user is immune to damage and effects from Electric type Moves, and each time they are hit by one, their Special Attack is raised by 1 Combat Stage. If a ranged Electric Move is used within 25 meters of the user, the Move is drawn to the user without fail, and cannot miss.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.effect: Paralysis

abilities.name: Liquid Ooze
abilities.effect: When the user is hit by a draining Move, the attacker loses HP instead of gaining it.

abilities.name: Liquid Voice
abilities.effect: When using a Move with the Sound keyword, the Move is changed into a Water type.

abilities.name: Long Reach
abilities.effect: The user makes no contact with targets when using moves. Also, melee ranged moves are treated as Ranged (10) instead.

abilities.name: Mach Speed
abilities.effect: Flying

abilities.name: Magician
abilities.effect: When the user hits an opponent that is holding an item with a ranged move, and is not holding an item, the user takes the target's held item.

abilities.name: Magic Bounce
abilities.effect: When the user is hit by a Melee non-damaging Move, it may reflect the Move back to the attacker. This may be used to change the placement of any Hazards set within 10 meters of the user.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.effect: Whenever the user would take damage that isn't the direct result of a Move's Damage Dice Roll, the user does not take damage.

abilities.name: Magma Armour
abilities.effect: Freezing

abilities.name: Magnet Pull
abilities.effect: The target Steel type Pokemon may not move more than 20 meters awy from the user, or may not move closer than 20 feet, as the user prefers.

abilities.name: Marvel Scale
abilities.effect: When Asleep, Burned, Frozen, Paralyzed, or Poisoned, the user's Defense and Special Defense are raised by 2 Combat Stages. They return to their previous values when cured of their status affliction.

abilities.name: Mega Launcher
abilities.effect: The user deals an additonal 2 STAB damage when using the Moves: Aura Sphere, Dark Pulse, Dragon Pulse, Heal Pulse, Origin Pulse, or Water Pulse.

abilities.name: Merciless
abilities.effect: If the user is attacking a Poisoned target, its Moves are always Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Mind Mold
abilities.effect: Psychic

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.effect: When an ally with the Plus Ability is within 10 meters of the user, the ally's Special Attack is raised by 2 Combat Stages. The ally can only be affected like this by one ally at a time.

abilities.name: Misty Surge
abilities.effect: The user may, as a Free Action, use the Move Misty Terrain.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.effect: The target's Ability is disabled; it cannot be used until the end of the encounter.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.effect: The user is forced to use Moody on the first turn of an encounter, and once again in 1d4+1 rounds after each use. Roll 1d6 twice, the first die raises the chosen statistic by 2 Combat Stages, and the second die lowers it by 1 Combat Stage. On a 1, re-roll that die; a 2 affects Attack; a 3 affects Defense; a 4 affects Special Attack; a 5 affects Special Defense; a 6 affects Speed.

abilities.name: Motor Drive
abilities.effect: The pokemon is immune to the damage and effects of Electric type moves. When hit by one, the user raises its Speed by 1 Combat Stage.

abilities.name: Mountain Peak
abilities.effect: Rock

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.effect: Whenever the user's Moves cause a target to faint, the user may raise its Attack by 1 Combat Stage.

abilities.name: Multiscale
abilities.effect: When the user takes damage from a Move at full HP, half the total damage before applying weakness, resistance, and defense.

abilities.name: Multitype
abilities.effect: The user changes its Type to any type. Multitype cannot be copied or disabled.

abilities.name: Mummy
abilities.effect: Whenever the user is targeted with a Melee Move, the attacker replaces all of its Abilities with Mummy for 1d6+2 rounds.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.effect: The user is cured of Burn, Frozen, Paralysis, Poison, and Sleep when returning to its Pokeball.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.effect: For the remainder of the encounter, the user cannot miss with or be missed by any Moves.

abilities.name: Normalize
abilities.effect: For the remainder of the encounter, the user treats all Moves as if they were Normal type.

abilities.name: Neuroforce
abilities.effect: When the user deals Super-Effective damage, they deal an additional 3d20 damage.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.effect: The Infatuation conditon, and the effects of the Move Taunt.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.effect: Electric

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.effect: The user does not take damage from Weather effects, and is also immune to the Moves: Cotton Spore, Poison Powder, Powder, Rage Powder, Sleep Powder, Spore, and Stun Spore.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.effect: Grass

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.effect: Confusion

abilities.name: Parental Bond
abilities.effect: When using a damaging Move that does have the Scatter keyword, the user may immediately use the same Move against hte same target, or spot if using a Burst Move, unless the foes were lowered to 0 HP or less. The second attack does not use the Move's Damage Dice Roll.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.effect: When the user hits an opponent that has a held item with a Melee Move, the user takes that item if it is not holding any.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.effect: You may use Pickup at the end of any encounter. Roll 1d20, and consult the Pickup table to figure out what you find.

abilities.name: Pixilate
abilities.effect: The user's Normal type Moves are treated as Fairy type, and deal an additonal 2 STAB damage.

abilities.name: Plus
abilities.effect: When an ally with the Minus Ability is within 10 meters of the user, the ally's Special Attack is raised by 2 Combat Stages. The ally can only be affected like this by one ally at a time.

abilities.name: Poison Heal
abilities.effect: When Poisoned or Badly Poisoned, the user gains 1/8th of its maximum HP instead of losing HP, as well as not having any Combat Stages lowered as a result of being poisoned.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.effect: When the user is hit by a Melee Move, the attacker is Poisoned.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.effect: The user can Poison targets of Melee physical damaging Moves with an Accuracy Check roll of 15 or more.

abilities.name: Power Construct
abilities.effect: When the user is in danger, it becomes its Complete Form, recovering to its maximum HP and increasing its Base Stats.

abilities.name: Power of Alchemy
abilities.effect: Whenever an ally is knocked out, the user may change its Ability from Power of Alchemy to the ally's Ability until the end of the encounter.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.effect: For the remainder of the encounter, any none-damaging Moves the user knows can be used as an Interrupt, unless it sets the target's HP to 0.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.effect: When this Ability is activated, all enemies have their Moves set to their original frequencies if they'd been increased, in additon, At-Will Moves are set to Every Other Turn.

abilities.name: Primordial Sea
abilities.effect: The user may, as a Free Action, use the Move Rain Dance.

abilities.name: Prism Armour
abilities.effect: The user takes damage that would be Super-Effective as if it was not Super-Effective.

abilities.name: Protean
abilities.effect: For the remainder of the encounter, whenever the user uses a Move, it immediately changes its Type to match the Move it's using, before dealing damge.

abilities.name: Psychic Surge
abilities.effect: The user may, as a Free Action, use the Move Psychic Terrain.

abilities.name: Pure Blooded
abilities.effect: Dragon

abilities.name: Pure Power
abilities.effect: The user's base Attack is doubled. This may double bonuses from Nature or Vitamins, but not bonuses from Features.

abilities.name: Queenly Majesty
abilities.effect: Pokemon within 20 meters of the user cannot use Interrupt Moves.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.effect: When Burned, Frozen, Poisoned, or Asleep, the user's Speed is raised by 2 Combat Stages. When Paralyzed, the user's Speed is raised by 4 Combat Stages. The user's Speed is reset once they lose the Status Condition.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.effect: When in Rainy Weather, the user regains 1/16th of their maximum HP at the beginning of their turns.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.effect: When the user is hit by a Bug, Dark, or Ghost type Move, they may raise their Speed by 1 Combat Stage.

abilities.name: Receiver
abilities.effect: Whenever an ally is knocked out, the user may change its Ability from Receiver to the ally's Ability until the end of the encounter.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.effect: The user deals an additional 2 STAB damage when using Moves that cause recoil damage.

abilities.name: Refrigerate
abilities.effect: The user's Normal type Moves are treated as Ice type, and deal an additional STAB damage.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.effect: The user instantly heals 1/4 of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.effect: When battling a same-gendered foe, the user may raise their Attack by 2 Combat Stages - once per Encounter only.

abilities.name: RKS System
abilities.effect: The user may change its type from Normal to the Type according to which memory disc it is holding as a Free Action.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.effect: Recoil

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.effect: When the user is hit by a Melee Move, the attacker loses 1/8th of their maximum HP, without applying weakness, resistance, or defenses.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.effect: The user cannot be Trapped, and their Speed Combat Stages cannot be lowered below 0. The user's Speed Skills are +2.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.effect: While in a Sandstorm, the user may activate Sand Force to become immune to the Sandstorm damage, and deal an additional +1 STAB with Rock, Steel, and Ground type Moves regardless of the user's type.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.effect: While in a Sandstorm, the user may activate SAnd Rush to become immune to the Sandstorm damage, and raise its Speed by 4 Combat Stages. The user's Speed evasion is not raised because of this.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.effect: The user may, as a Free Action, use the Move Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.effect: Sand Veil may only be activated in a Sandstorm. The user creates a pocket of Clear Weather around itself and any other targets it wants to that is less than 15 meters away within the Sandstorm. Any Move that tries to target a pokemon inside one of these pockets must roll +2 to hit during Accuracy Check. The effect vanishes once the user falls below 0 HP, or is returned to a Pokeball.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.effect: The user does not take damage from Grass moves. If hit by one, the user may raise its Attack 1 Combat Stage once per turn.

abilities.name: Schooling
abilities.effect: The user must be at least level 20 to benefit from this Ability. When near a large body of water, the user changes into its Schooling form. If the user's HP falls to 50% of its maximum, it returns to its single form.

abilities.name: Scrappy
abilities.effect: The user can always hit Ghost type Pokemon, without applying weaknesses, resistances, or immunities. If the target would normally be immune, treat the Move as dealing Neutral damage.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.effect: When a Move's effect has omething that activates if you roll high enough during Accuracy Check, all of those requirements are reduced by 3. This does not apply to Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Shadow Shield
abilities.effect: When the user is at full HP, it reduces damage from the first damaging Move that hits it by 1/2.

abilities.name: Shadow Tag
abilities.effect: The user Traps adjacent enemies, who can only Shift within 20 meters of the User.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.effect: The user is cured of Burns, Freezing, Paralysis, Poison, and Sleep.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.effect: Once used, Sheer Force is active until the end of the encounter. Moves that have additional effects that activate during an Accuracy Check ignore the additional effects, and instead deal an additional 2 STAB damage.

abilities.name: Shell Armour
abilities.effect: Critical Hits

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.effect: The secondary effects of damage dealing Moves that target the user are disabled.

abilities.name: Shields Down
abilities.effect: When the user's HP is reduced to 50% or less, it changes into its Core form.

abilities.name: Simple
abilities.effect: When the user's Combat Stages are changed, the amount they change is doubled.

abilities.name: Skill Link
abilities.effect: The user's Moves with the keyword Scatter can be used for their maximum amounts of time, even if one of the first attempts miss.

abilities.name: Slow Start
abilities.effect: For 3 rounds, the Pokemon's Speed and Attack stats are halved.

abilities.name: Slush Rush
abilities.effect: While in Hail, the user may activate Slush Rush until the end of the encounter, becoming immune to the damage from Hail and raising its Speed by 4 Combat Stages. The user's Speed evasion does not increase due to this.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.effect: Add an additional Damage Dice Roll - including the base damage - when the user gets a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.effect: Snow Cloak may only be activated while in Hail. The user creates a pocket of Clear Weather around itself and any other targets it wants to that is less than 15 meters away within the Hail. Any Move that tries to target a pokemon inside one of these pockets must roll +2 to hit during Accuracy Check. The effect vanishes once the user falls below 0 HP, or is returned to a Pokeball.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.effect: The user may, as a Free Action, use the Move Hail

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.effect: While in Sunny Weather, the user loses 1/8ths of its max hp on its turn, and its Special Attack is raised by 2 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Solid Rock
abilities.effect: Super Effective, and Super-Super Effective, Moves that target the user are one level less effective.

abilities.name: Soul-Heart
abilities.effect: The user raises its Special Attack by 1 COmbat Stage whenever anything within 50 meters of it is knocked out.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.effect: The following moves have no effect on the Pokemon: Boomburst, Bug Buzz, Chatter, Clanging Scales, Confide, Disarming Voice, Echoed Voice, Grass Whistle, Growl, Heal Bell, Hyper Voice, Metal Sound, Noble Roar, Parting Shot, Perish Song, Relic Song, Roar, Roar of Time, Round, Screech, Sing, Snarl, Snore, Sparkling Aria, Supersonic, and Uproar.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.effect: For the remainder of the encounter, the user's Speed is raised by 1 Combat Stage at the start of its turn.

abilities.name: Stakeout
abilities.effect: When using a damaging Move and targetting a pokemon that was just released from a pokeball, the user does double the normal damage after applying weakness and resistance.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.effect: When the user is hit by a Melee Move, the attack becomes Paralyzed after damage is dealt.

abilities.name: Stall
abilities.effect: The user always goes last in combat. If a pokemon goes to the end of the queue, the user is still the last to move.

abilities.name: Stamina
abilities.effect: When the user is with a damaging Move, the user's Defense is raised by 1 Combat Stage after the damage is resolved.

abilities.name: Stance Change
abilities.effect: When the user uses a damaging move, switch its Defense and Special Defense stats with the Attack and Special Attack stats. When it uses an Intercept Move, return its stats to normal.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.effect: When the user Flinches, it raises its Speed by 1 Combat Stage.

abilities.name: Steelworker
abilities.effect: The user's Steel type Moves deal an additonal 2 STAB.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.effect: The user's damaging Moves cause the target to Flinch on an Accuracy Check roll of 19-20. If a Move already has a chance to cause Flinching, Stench lowers the threshold by 2.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.effect: The user's held items cannot be destroyed, dropped, stolen, or switched

abilities.name: Storm Drain
abilities.effect: The user is immune to damage and effects from Water type Moves, and each time they are hit by one, their Special Attack is raised by 1 Combat Stage. If a ranged Water Move is used within 25 meters of the user, the Move is drawn to the user without fail, and cannot miss.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.effect: The user deals an additional 1 STAB when using the following Moves: Bite, Bug Bite, Crunch, Fire Fang, Hyper Fang, Ice Fang, Poison Fang, Psychic Fangs, and Thunder Fang.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.effect: The user is immune to one-hit-knockout Moves. If any attack would lower the user to 0 HP or less from maximum HP, the user's HP is instead lowered to 1.

abilities.name: Suction Cups
abilities.effect: The following moves have no effect on the user: Roar, and Whirlwind. The user is also immune to Push effects.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.effect: The user's Moves are Critical Hits on 18-20. If the Move already has an extended Critcal Hit range, Super Luck extends that range by 2.

abilities.name: Surge Surfer
abilities.effect: While in Electrified Weather, the user may activate Surge Surfer and increase their Speed by 4 Combat Stages. They do not gain extra Speed evasion because of this increase.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.effect: Bug

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.effect: The user and adjacent allies are immune to Sleep.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: While in Rainy Weather, the user's Speed is raised by 4 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Symbiosis
abilities.effect: The user gives its Held Item to an adjacent target without a Held Item.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.effect: Whenever an enemy Burns, Freezes, Paralyzes, Poisons, or puts the user to Sleep, the enemy is given the same Status effect they inflicted.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.effect: Whenever the user is hit by a Melee Move, the attacker's Speed is lowered by 1 Combat Stage.

abilities.name: Tangling Hair
abilities.effect: While the user is Confused, enemies must roll +3 during Accuracy Check to hit.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.effect: Damaging Moves with a maximum damage of less than 30 add an additional 2d10 to their damage roll. Technician may only be applied once when used with a Move that has the Scatter keyword.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.effect: Whenevre the user is a Legal Target of a Move, if the attacker does not want the user to be targetted, it is not.

abilities.name: Teravolt
abilities.effect: The target's Abilities are Disabled until the end of the encounter.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: The user is resistant to Fire and Ice type Moves.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.effect: The user's resisted and double-resisted Moves are one step more effective.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.effect: Water

abilities.name: Tough Claws
abilities.effect: The user deals an additional 15 damage when using Melee Moves.

abilities.name: Toxic Boost
abilities.effect: When Poisoned or Badly Poisoned, the user's Attack is raised by 2 Combat Stages. When cured, it is lowered by 2 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.effect: The user gains the Ability of a target within 10 metres, until it falls below 0 HP or is recalled to a Pokeball.

abilities.name: Triage
abilities.effect: The user's Moves that can cure afflictions or heal HP have Interrupt.

abilities.name: Truant
abilities.effect: Roll 1d20 when the user tries to Shift and/or use a Move; on 1-8 the user does nothing; on 9-20 the user acts normally.

abilities.name: Turboblaze
abilities.effect: The target's Abilities are Disabled until the end of the encounter.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.effect: When the user is attacking or being attacked, it ignores all Combat Stages on the relevant target or attacker.

abilities.name: Unbreakable
abilities.effect: Steel

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.effect: After consuming a held item, the user's Speed is raised by 2 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.effect: During battle, as long as the user has line of sight to an enemy, that enemy may not eat or drink anything. This includes Berries, Vitamins, or anything else that must be eaten to take effect.

abilities.name: Venom
abilities.effect: Poison

abilities.name: Victory Star
abilities.effect: Any allied pokemon in the encounter gain a -2 bonus to their Accuracy Checks.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.effect: Sleep

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.effect: After calculating damage that would be dealt from an Electric type Move that hit the user, heal half of that value instead of taking damage. Do this before applying defenses, but after weakness and resistance.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.effect: After calculating damage that would be dealt from a Water type Move that hit the user, heal half of that value instead of taking damage. Do this before applying defenses, but after weakness and resistance.

abilities.name: Water Bubble
abilities.effect: The user is immune to Burn, and is treated as if they were resistant to Fire type Moves.

abilities.name: Water Compaction
abilities.effect: When the user is hit by a Water type damaging Move, raise their Defense by 3 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.effect: Burns

abilities.name: Weak Armour
abilities.effect: Whenever the user is hit by a physical attack, the user may lower its Defense by 1 Combat Stage to raise its Speed the same amount.

abilities.name: White Smoke
abilities.effect: The user's Combat Stages may not be lowered.

abilities.name: Wimp Out
abilities.effect: When the user is damaged below 50% of their maximum HP, the user immediately begins to flee - gaining +20 to all Speed Skills. If a trainer does not return the user to its Pokeball within 1 round, the user's Loyalty will be lowered by 1.

abilities.name: Wonder Guard
abilities.effect: Only damaging Moves that are Super-Effective hit the user, all other Moves deal 0 damage.

abilities.name: Wonder Skin
abilities.effect: Whenever the user is hit by a Ranged non-damaging move that inflicts a status conditon, flip a coin; on a heads, the user ignores the affliction it would have received.

abilities.name: Zen Mode
abilities.effect: Keep two sets of Base Stats for the user, with the HP stats kept the same. If the user has its base stats altered in any way, both sets are affected. As a Free Action, the user may activate Zen Mode if it has less than 50% of its maximum HP, and may switch back as a Free Action. The user may switch forms once per encounter.
